summary: Completed frontend testing of enhanced Help Center with detailed documentation articles. All 9 features tested passed successfully (100%). Help Center at /help loads correctly with 6 category cards, detailed article modals with Features/Steps/Visual Guide sections, 5 working tabs, and AI Assistant.

frontend: Help Center page loads at /help with data-testid='help-center-page'
6 category cards display correctly: Getting Started (2), Dashboards (3), Charts (2), Report Builder (4), Data Management (3), Widget Types (4)
Clicking category card opens detailed article modal with gradient header
Article modal shows Features section with sparkle icon and green checkmarks
Article modal shows Step-by-Step section with numbered purple circles (1, 2, 3, 4)
Article modal shows Visual Guide section (dark bg-gray-900 with UI element descriptions)
Close Guide button works correctly to close modal
X button in modal header also closes modal
All 5 tabs work: Overview, FAQ, Troubleshooting, Shortcuts, What's New
AI Assistant opens via 'Chat with AI' quick action
AI Assistant shows DataViz Assistant header, welcome message, suggested questions

critical_code_review_comments: DETAILED_ARTICLES object well-structured with 6 categories containing sections with title, content, features, steps, and screenshot visual guides
ArticleSection component properly renders Features (with CheckCircle icons), Step-by-Step (with numbered badges), and ScreenshotPreview (Visual Guide)
DetailedArticleView modal has smooth animations using framer-motion
All UI elements have proper dark mode support
context_for_next_testing_agent: Help Center enhanced with detailed articles is fully functional. Key test IDs: help-center-page, help-search-input, tab-overview, tab-faq, tab-troubleshooting, tab-shortcuts, tab-whats-new. Article modals open on category card click and show Features/Steps/Visual Guide sections. AI Assistant works via Chat with AI button.
